task.title: Configuring AMF support for NAS cause code mapping per use case
task.shortdesc: Step examples for configuring AMF support for the NAS cause code mapping per use case.

step.cmd: Configure the access restriction to NAS cause mapping profile.

stepxmp.codeblock: +--------------------------------------------+----------------+ | Field | Value | +--------------------------------------------+----------------+ | amfAccessRestrictionNasMappingProfile | default | | name* | default | | udmResponseTimeOut | 15 | | forbiddenTaiHplmn | 15 | | ratNotAllowedHplmn | 15 | | ausfResponseTimeOut | 15 | | serviceAreaRestriction | 28 | | coreNetworkTypeRestriction | 15 | | nonEncryptedSuciRestriction | 3 | | odb5gPacketServices | 7 | | roam3gppAccessNotAllowed | 15 | | roam3gppAccessForbiddenTai | 15 | | nrRatNotAllowedForRoamer | 15 | | wlanRatRestriction | 72 | | interPlmnMobRegUpdtRej | 9 | | home3gppAccessNotAllowed | 15 | | nrPlmnNotAllowed | 27 | | nssfResponseTimeout | 21 | | udmUnavailability | 10 | | nssfUnavailability | 10 | | ausfUnavailability | 10 | | noAllowedNssai | 10 | | securityModeCompleteTimeout | 10 | | authenticationResponseTimeout | 10 | | noCommonSecurityAlgorithm | 10 | | ausfMsgDecodingFailure | 10 | | nssfMsgDecodingFailure | 10 | | udmMsgDecodingFailure | 10 | +--------------------------------------------+----------------+

step.cmd: Configure cause code mapping for the NRF related internal error.

substep.cmd: Create the NRF HTTP2 to the NAS CC mapping list name.
Change the AMF UE PLMN services to point to the new list.

stepxmp.codeph: cmm amfUePlmnServices modify ETPLMN -- amfNrfHttp2ToNasCcMappingListName list1

substep.cmd: Change the default mapped cause value.

step.cmd: Configure NAS cause code mapping for the SMSF error.

substep.cmd: List the AMF SMSM NAS mapping.

stepxmp.codeblock: +-------------------------------------------------+-------------+ | amfSmsfNasMapping | amf5gMmCc | +-------------------------------------------------+-------------+ | default~ContextNotFound404 | 9 | | default~IncorrectLength411 | 90 | | default~InsufficientResources500 | 0 | | default~InvalidApi400 | 90 | | default~InvalidMessageFormat400 | 90 | | default~InvalidQueryParameter400 | 90 | | default~MandatoryIeIncorrect400 | 90 | | default~MandatoryIeMissing400 | 90 | | default~MandatoryQueryParamIncorrect400 | 0 | | default~MandatoryQueryParamMissing400 | 0 | | default~ModificationNotAllowed403 | 0 | | default~NfCongestion503 | 0 | | default~NfCongestionRisk429 | 0 | | default~OptionalIeIncorrect400 | 0 | | default~OptionalQueryParamIncorrect400 | 0 | | default~ResourceUriStructureNotFound404 | 0 | | default~RoamingNotAllowed403 | 90 | | default~ServiceNotAllowed403 | 90 | | default~SmsPayloadError400 | 90 | | default~SmsPayloadMissing400 | 90 | | default~SubscriptionNotFound404 | 0 | | default~SystemFailure500 | 0 | | default~UnspecifiedMessageFailure400 | 0 | | default~UnspecifiedNfFailure500 | 0 | | default~UserNotFound404 | 0 | +-------------------------------------------------+-------------+
